meanings.definition: A person or group of people who renovate and improve a neighborhood, typically resulting in the displacement of lower-income residents.
meanings.sent1: The gentrifiers in our area are fixing up old buildings.
meanings.sent2: The gentrifiers brought new cafes and shops to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The gentrifiers turned the old street into a trendy spot.
meanings.sent4: The gentrifiers were like busy bees, buzzing around the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The gentrifiers painted the town with fresh colors and ideas.

meanings.definition: The act of gentrifying a neighborhood, often leading to increased property values and changes in the community.
meanings.sent1: Gentrifiers can cause rents to go up in a neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The gentrifiers' work made the area more expensive.
meanings.sent3: The gentrifiers' effect on property prices was surprising.
meanings.sent4: The gentrifiers' impact on the neighborhood was like a wave of change.
meanings.sent5: The gentrifiers transformed the community with their actions.
